articles.title: Apple's 'incredibly private' Safari is not so private in Europe - The Register
articles.description: Infosec eggheads find iGiant left EU iOS 17 users open to being tracked around the web
articles.content:
Apple's grudging accommodation of European antitrust rules by allowing third-party app stores on iPhones has left users of its Safari browser exposed to potential web activity tracking.
